description: The race saw hundreds of competitors swim 6.5km across the Bosphorus from Asia to Europe.
title: Bosphorus Cross-Continental Swimming Race: Hundreds join Istanbul competition
title_page: Bosphorus Cross-Continental Swimming Race: Hundreds join Istanbul competition - BBC News
maintext: Some changes were made for the pandemic, with competitors wearing masks before setting off and during the award ceremony. And in contrast to previous years, no spectators were allowed to attend.
